TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Visual3D extends System.Windows.DependencyObject implements class System.Windows.Media.Animation.IAnimatable
Public MustInherit Class Visual3D Inherits DependencyObject Implements IAnimatable
public ref class Visual3D abstract : System::Windows::DependencyObject, System::Windows::Media::Animation::IAnimatable
type Visual3D = class inherit DependencyObject interface DUCE.IResource interface IAnimatable

summary.span: 提供 3D 視覺物件通用的服務和屬性，包括點擊測試、座標轉換，以及周框計算。

span.span: Provides services and properties that are common to visual 3-D objects, including hit-testing, coordinate transformation, and bounding box calculations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於類別，無法共用或重複使用的物件。Unlike the class, objects cannot be shared or reused. 存取權服務上使用靜態方法類別。Access services by using static methods on the class. 物件經過最佳化場景節點。 objects are optimized to be scene nodes. 比方說，它們會快取範圍。For example, they cache bounds. 您可以在每次使用場景中物件的唯一執行個體的物件。Whenever you can, use objects for unique instances of objects within your scene. 這種使用方式比對與是已最佳化來共用及重複使用的輕量級物件的物件。This usage contrasts with that of objects, which are lightweight objects that are optimized to be shared and reused. 例如，使用物件以建立模型的一輛車，並使用十放置在場景中的十個汽車的物件。For example, use a object to build a model of a car; and use ten objects to place ten cars in your scene.

span.para: 衍生自類別必須呼叫這個方法來通知層新的子系出現在子系集合。層再呼叫方法。
A class that derives from must call this method to notify the layer that a new child appeared in the children collection. The layer then calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項轉換會投射到 2d 空間的 3d 點。This transform projects a 3-D point to a 2-D space. 產生的點是在指定的上階的座標空間中已轉換的 3d 點。The resulting point is the transformed 3-D point in the coordinate space of the specified ancestor. 方法在.NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。The method is introduced in .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: The specified object is not an ancestor of this object.

summary.span: 取得 物件的子項目數目。

span.span: Gets the number of child elements for the object.
The number of child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，沒有任何子項目。By default, a has no child elements. 因此，預設實作永遠會傳回 0。Therefore, the default implementation always returns 0. 屬性在.NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。The property is introduced in .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.para: 若要正確列舉視覺化樹狀結構中，衍生自的類別必須覆寫這個屬性，並也會覆寫方法。
To correctly enumerate the visual tree, a class that derives from must override this property and also override the method.
